problem_text_cn: 2009年l0月27日,上海队小将吴迪在全运会赛场上脱颖而出,以2:0的比分战胜了男子单打头号种子选手曾少眩,勇夺全运会网球男子单打冠军．下图是吴迪在决赛中打的一个球,已知网高0.8米,击球点到网的水平距离为4米,打球时使球恰好能打过网,且落点恰好在离网6米的位置上,则球拍击球的高度h为()
problem_text_en: On N_2 N_0, N_1, 2009, Shanghai team player Wu Di came to the fore in the National Games and defeated the top-seeded men's singles player Zeng Shaoxuan with a score of N_3:N_4, and won the men's singles championship in tennis at the National Games. The picture below is a ball played by Wu Di in the final. It is known that the net height is N_5, and the horizontal distance from the hitting point to the net is N_6. When the ball is played, the ball can hit the net and the landing point is exactly N_7 away from the net. Then the height h of the racket hit is ()
